name: Alpha Beast
description:
IT IS THE NEAR FUTURE,

MANKIND HAS PERISHED
AND ONLY ANIMALS REIGN SUPREME.

FERAL CREATURES ARE LOCKED
IN A NEVER ENDING CLASH FOR TERRITORY

THE ONE WHO MARKS THE MOST
IS CONSIDERED TO BE THE ALPHA BEAST.

---------------

The game combines steering mechanics with splatoon-like territory fight. The proof of concept didn't work as well as imagined, but if you've got a skillfull friend to compete with, you'll have some fun time with Alpha Beast.
